import useSWR, { mutate } from "swr"; import formatRelative from "date-fns/formatRelative"; import differenceInMinutes from "date-fns/differenceInMinutes"; import Link from "next/link"; import Layout from "../Components/Layout"; import gql from "graphql-tag"; import { useRouter } from "next/router"; import { hasuraUserClient } from "../../lib/hasura-user-client"; import { useAuthState, useAuthDispatch } from "../../context/auth"; import TodoFilters from "../Components/Todo/TodoFilters"; const Todos = gql` query MyQuery { User { id } } `; const GetCandidats = gql` query MyQuery($id: Int!) { Todo(where: { user_id: { _eq: $id } }) { Name user_id } } `; export const getStaticPaths = async () => { const hasura = hasuraUserClient(); const { User } = await hasura.request(Todos); return { paths: User.map(({ id }) => ({ params: { id: id.toString(), }, })), fallback: false, }; }; export const getStaticProps = async ({ params }) => { const hasura = hasuraUserClient(); const { id } = params; console.log(params); const initialData = await hasura.request(GetCandidats, { id }); return { props: { initialData, }, revalidate: 1, }; }; export default function TodoList({ initialData }) { const hasura = hasuraUserClient(); const { query } = useRouter(); const { id } = query; const { data } = useSWR( [GetCandidats, id], (query, id) => hasura.request(query), { initialData, revalidateOnMount: true, } ); return (
